name: Just fishing (itch) (SalsaDodo)
description:
Controls Key Action Arrow keys or WASD Movement F Start fishing
Hook fish
Start reeling in fish
Introduction

Hi there!
Nice day for fishing, ain't it?

Let's get you started as quick as possible! Just walk towards any water, and press F to fish! When there's a fish on the hook, press F again... And then keep pressing F to reel in the fish! Fishing pools generally contain more difficult fish to catch. So you might want to start out by fishing in the open sea. Your skill increases with every fish you catch. The higher your skill, the easier it will be to catch fish! It's time to get started.

Have fun!
